welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Marco de Canavezes, a charming city known for its historic architecture and breathtaking views of the Douro River. We hope you have a wonderful stay and take the time to explore all the beauty this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vila Real Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Vila Real Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'VINCI Airports WiFi' and following the instructions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights within Portugal.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
